name: The Pharody
storyline: Welcome to a unique world of nonsense, banter and trash. Forget about boring quests and hackneyed plots. A real nightmare awaits you here. You will feel the atmosphere that you will not find anywhere else. You will encounter everything from cordless irons to monuments to medieval Gagarin. Procedurally generated dungeons and unconventional humor await you.
summary: ARPG about the medieval inquisition. With a view from the 3rd person. Ridicules (parodies) the RPG genre. 18+ as it contains references to alcohol, erotica and rude conversations
